title: Has anyone tried the cheese trend?
body: I dropped a slice of cheese on Biso's face, and it was the most hilarious thing ever!

title: How do i make my cat take his medicine?

body: It's like he's a shredding machine!

title: Literal Shit Storm!
body: Milo wipes his poopy bum all over my apartment floor!
